GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.39 to before v4.19.267
GSD.description:
scsi: target: tcm_loop: Fix possible name leak in tcm_loop_setup_hba_bus()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.267 by commit 41a6b8b527a5957fab41c3c05e25ad125268e2e9, it was introduced in version v2.6.39 by commit 3703b2c5d041a68095cdd22380c23ce27d449ad7. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: scsi: target: tcm_loop: Fix possible name leak in tcm_loop_setup_hba_bus()
